channel.title: Please help, trying to add drops but something is wrong
channel.description: Hi I added some new drops to npcdrop.cfg. Now I'm getting an error every time I run my source(delta). Here's the error: [code]Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2086) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:569) at server.main(server.java:164) [/code] What is going on?

item.title: Please help, trying to add drops but something is wrong
item.dc:creator: @1000arrows 1000arrows
item.description:
@1000arrows wrote:

Yea I compiled and it doesnt say there are any problems. It only says it when i run the server. I searched the lines where i added the drops. Here they are:

//kbd npcdrop = 50 8002 1 1 npcdrop = 50 7806 1 1 npcdrop = 50 13665 1 1 npcdrop = 50 8004 1 1 npcdrop = 50 8100 1 1 npcdrop = 50 1077 1 1 npcdrop = 50 1107 1 1 npcdrop = 50 746 1 1 npcdrop = 50 1540 1 100 npcdrop = 50 1149 1 3 npcdrop = 50 2577 1 3 npcdrop = 50 2581 1 3 npcdrop = 50 1079 1 5 npcdrop = 50 4587 1 3 npcdrop = 50 2856 1 2 npcdrop = 50 2857 1 2 npcdrop = 50 536 1 100 npcdrop = 50 35 1 3 npcdrop = 50 2621 1 3

Read full topic
item.source: Please help, trying to add drops but something is wrong

item.title: Please help, trying to add drops but something is wrong
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

[quote=“1000arrows, post:1, topic:412258”]Hi I added some new drops to npcdrop.cfg. Now I’m getting an error every time I run my source(delta). Here’s the error:

Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2086) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:569) at server.main(server.java:164)
What is going on?[/quote]

Did you compile after you finished editing? Try visiting the lines and seeing if you can find a typo. For example: When it says java:2086 the line that the error is on is line 2086. In notepad type Ctrl+G and search for that line. Lemme know if it’s still giving you errors after you’ve tried these methods.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help, trying to add drops but something is wrong
